channel.title: Hiring on Dr. Michael Salter-Townshend
channel.description: Recent content in Hiring on Dr. Michael Salter-Townshend

item.title: SFI CRTs - PhD positions available
item.description: I am a named supervisor in two new Centre’s for Research Training funded by Science Foundation Ireland: Foundations in Data Science Genomics Data Science These offer the fantastic opportunity to enter a fully funded PhD programme with a large cohort of other PhD candidates. Use the links to apply!
